get.summary: Get a list of active answers
get.description: Returns a list of answers with status 'Y'.

400.description: Bad request or no data found

message.example: Couldn't get data. Please, try again.

post.description: Create a new answers with a title

put.description: Update a Answer by ID with a new title

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Answers to update

delete.description: Deletes a answer by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the answer to delete
